originInfo.publisher: Louisiana. Dept. of Wildlife and Fisheries

mods.abstract: The 'gator is prodded with an iron hook on the end of an 18 foot pole. This angers him to the point of grabbing the hook. He is brought to the surface and hit over th ehead with an axe.

titleInfo.title: Louisiana Sea Grant Digital Images Collection
